CustomField.description: Changing from if including TLO to standard lookup to Account Online Service Integration.
CustomField.formula: if( RIGHT( if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"TLO"), "TLO; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"HRO"), "HRO; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"PHS"), "PHS; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"PNG TLO"), "PNG TLO; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"PNG STM"), "PNG STM; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"BeneTrac"), "BeneTrac; ", "") , 2 ) = "; ", LEFT(if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"TLO"), "TLO; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"HRO"), "HRO; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"PHS"), "PHS; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"PNG TLO"), "PNG TLO; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"PNG STM"), "PNG STM; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"BeneTrac"), "BeneTrac; ", "") , LEN( if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"TLO"), "TLO; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"HRO"), "HRO; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"PHS"), "PHS; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"PNG TLO"), "PNG TLO; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"PNG STM"), "PNG STM; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"BeneTrac"), "BeneTrac; ", "") ) - 2 ), if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"TLO"), "TLO; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"HRO"), "HRO; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"PHS"), "PHS; ", "") & if (includes( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c ,"PNG TLO"), "PNG TLO; CustomField.label: Integration
